data.title: Insta360 wins ITC ruling against GoPro's patent claims in case no. 337-TA-1400, proving independent innovation.
data.description: The U.S. International Trade Commission has dismissed GoPro's allegations of patent infringement, supporting the independent innovation of Insta360. The ruling, announced in Los Angeles on February 26, 2026, marks a significant win for Insta360, operating under Arashi Vision Inc. (688775.SS), in Case No. 337-TA-1400.
According to a bourse filing, Vietnam’s Vingroup plans to issue bonds on an overseas exchange to raise up to $350 million.

data.title: Ultra Clean Holdings, Inc. priced $525.0 million in convertible senior notes due 2031 in a private offering.
data.description: On February 26, 2026, a company based in Hayward, California, known as Ultra Clean Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: UCTT), disclosed the pricing details of its recent financial move. The firm successfully set the offer for $525.0 million aggregate principal value of 0.00% convertible senior notes to be paid by 2031. This private offering was designed for individuals deemed as potential investors in the opportunity.

data.title: Mulholland Group opens 2 new Dunkin' locations in NJ, reinforcing commitment to community, Feb. 26, 2026.
data.description: Two new Dunkin' locations were recently opened by The Mulholland Group in Haledon and Little Egg Harbor, New Jersey, during the week of February 26, 2026. This grand opening reflects a notable investment in the local communities and underlines the firm's dedication to enhancing its presence in the region. The company's move to establish these two new locations indicates a robust commitment to expanding its reach, with a focus on offering their services to a wider customer base.

data.title: An analyst suggests Bitcoin selling pressure is almost spent. Price may stabilize for a few weeks before potential recovery in Q4.
data.description: Crypto analyst Willy Woo predicts that Bitcoin will continue to trade in a sideways trend for the next few weeks. However, he believes that the cryptocurrency will not see significant movement until the fourth quarter. This forecast suggests that Bitcoin's price may remain relatively stable in the short term before potentially experiencing a shift later in the year.
GBP flat, +0.1% as UK Green Party secures Gorton & Denton seat.

data.title: Analyst predicts Ether to remain 'subdued' as near-term uncertainty is factored in, possibly trading sideways.
data.description: According to the lead analyst at Swyftx, Pav Hundal, the current uncertainty in the market has already been factored into the price of Ether. Unless unexpected catalysts arise, Ether is expected to maintain a sideways trading pattern in the near future.
J.P. Morgan raises Autodesk target price to $336 from $319.

data.title: Ransomware attacks rose by 50% in 2025, yet payments stagnated, showing attackers are struggling with lower returns.
data.description: A recent report from Chainalysis indicates that ransomware attackers are facing challenges in their operations, as they are now having to put in more effort while seeing decreasing returns. This is primarily due to the increased regulatory scrutiny and a growing trend of targeted organizations refusing to pay ransom demands. As a result, ransom proceeds have been significantly impacted, leading to a tougher landscape for cyber attackers.
According to a joint statement, the Pentagon, FAA, and CBP are coordinating efforts to mitigate the risks posed by drones along the U.S.-Mexico border.

data.title: ITC upholds GoPro's patent claim, bans Insta360 products in US. GoPro (NASDAQ: GPRO) victorious in patent dispute.
data.description: Today, in San Mateo, California, GoPro, Inc. disclosed that the U.S. International Trade Commission (ITC) has upheld the prior ruling by the administrative law judge regarding Insta360's infringement on GoPro's products. The ruling pertains to Insta360 importing and selling products in the United States that violate GoPro's intellectual property rights. GoPro's stock is listed on the NASDAQ under the symbol GPRO.

China’s military conducted a routine patrol in the South China Sea from February 23–26, according to a statement.

data.title: Arcfra launches Neutree for scalable enterprise AI infrastructure, a Model-as-a-Service platform in 2026.
data.description: In Singapore on February 26, 2026, Arcfra introduced Arcfra Neutree, an enterprise-level Model-as-a-Service (MaaS) platform tailored for efficient AI operations. This innovative cloud and AI-ready infrastructure aims to streamline AI services. It signifies a significant step in industrializing AI processes, putting AI innovation at the forefront.

data.title: RIMAN wins iF DESIGN AWARD 2026 for ICD Dermatology Line's packaging design, boosting global brand reputation.
data.description: A renowned South Korean skincare and wellness brand, RIMAN, based in Seoul, revealed on February 26, 2026, that its latest ICD Dermatology Line comprising boosters, serums, and creams, has been honored with the prestigious iF DESIGN AWARD 2026 in the Packaging Design sector. The cutting-edge packaging design showcases RIMAN's commitment to innovation and aesthetic appeal, garnering recognition in the industry.

data.title: Envision ships first commercial green ammonia cargo to South Korea from China, reducing carbon emissions.
data.description: In Chifeng, China on February 26, 2026, Envision, a top green technology firm, announced the initiation of the inaugural international delivery of green ammonia from Chifeng, Inner Mongolia to LOTTE Fine Chemical, a prominent chemical company in South Korea. This milestone shipment signifies the first of its kind globally.
